```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)

files <- fs::dir_ls(here::here("data"), regexp = "\\.csv$|\\.rds$")
fs::file_info(files) %>%
  select(path, size, change_time) %>%
  mutate(path = fs::path_file(path)) %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling()
```

Here's the raw data, refreshed every week or so.  
Get the CSV file for import in arbitrary software, and the `.rds` file if you happen to use R.


```{r table}
tibble::tribble(
  ~Network,           ~Content,  ~Format, ~Download,
  "ATP",              "Episodes", "RDS",   "atp.rds",
  "The Incomparable", "Shows",    "RDS",   "incomparable_shows.rds",
  "The Incomparable", "Shows",    "CSV",   "incomparable_shows.csv",
  "The Incomparable", "Episodes", "RDS",   "incomparable_shows.rds",
  "The Incomparable", "Episodes", "CSV",   "incomparable_shows.csv",
  "Relay.fm",         "Shows",    "RDS",   "relay_shows.rds",
  "Relay.fm",         "Shows",    "CSV",   "relay_shows.csv",
  "Relay.fm",         "Episodes", "RDS",   "relay_episodes.rds",
  "Relay.fm",         "Episodes", "CSV",   "relay_episodes.csv"
) %>%
  # mutate(Network = factor(Network)) %>%
  mutate(Download = glue::glue("<a href='/data/{Download}'>{Download}</a>")) %>%
  kable(escape = FALSE, format = "html") %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = TRUE) %>%
  collapse_rows(1)
```
